snippet: A new book, “Spies Against Armageddon: Inside Israel’s Secret Wars,” contends that the five Iranian nuclear scientists killed in the past five years were assassinated by Israel’s intelligence agency, the Mossad.
abstract: Book Spies Against Armageddon: Inside Israel’s Secret Wars by journalists Yossi Melman and Dan Raviv contends that five Iranian nuclear scientists killed in the past five years were all assassinated by Mossad operatives, most likely of Persian Jewish heritage; book has set off a buzz among both government and opposition news media in Iran.
lead_paragraph: A new book, “Spies Against Armageddon: Inside Israel’s Secret Wars,” contends that the five Iranian nuclear scientists killed in the past five years were assassinated by Israel’s intelligence agency, the Mossad.

headline.seo: Book Contends Iranian Scientists Were Killed by Israeli Mossad
headline.main: Tehran Abuzz as Book Says Israel Killed 5 Scientists
headline.print_headline: Tehran Abuzz As Book Says Israel Killed 5 Scientists
